casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jesse James LENOIR 194P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 25, 2018 W. Michael Spivey, Attorney at Law, for Lenoir, Jesse James. Kimberly Grande, Special Counsel, for State of North Carolina. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State.

*463The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of June 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of June 2018."
